Class JoinWaitingListDBController

java.lang.Object
dbLogic.restaurantDB.JoinWaitingListDBController
public class JoinWaitingListDBController extends Object
Handles database operations related to the waiting_list_entry table. Provides utilities for inserting entries, updating status, and querying waiting list and restaurant availability data.

  • Method Details

    • insertWaitingListEntry

      public static void insertWaitingListEntry(long confirmationCode, int userId, int numberOfGuests, String status) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new entry into the waiting list table. Used when no immediate table is available for the guest.
      Parameters:
      confirmationCode - The unique long code assigned to this waiting list entry.
      userId - The ID of the user (subscriber or guest).
      numberOfGuests - The party size.
      status - The initial status (e.g., 'WAITING' or 'ARRIVED').
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • updateStatus

      public static void updateStatus(long confirmationCode, String newStatus) throws Exception
      Updates the status of an existing waiting list entry and records the notification time.
      Parameters:
      confirmationCode - The unique identifier for the entry.
      newStatus - The new status string (e.g., 'NOTIFIED', 'CANCELLED').
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database error occurs or the connection fails.

    • getStatusByCode

      public static String getStatusByCode(long confirmationCode) throws Exception
      Retrieves the current status of a waiting list entry.
      Parameters:
      confirmationCode - The unique identifier for the entry.
      Returns:
      A String representing the current status, or null if no entry is found.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database access error occurs.

    • isUserAlreadyActive

      public static boolean isUserAlreadyActive(int userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the current status of a waiting list entry.
      Parameters:
      confirmationCode - The unique identifier for the entry.
      Returns:
      A String representing the current status, or null if no entry is found.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database access error occurs.
      SQLException

    • isRestaurantOpenNow

      public static boolean isRestaurantOpenNow() throws Exception
      Determines if the restaurant is currently open based on special or regular hours. Special hours take precedence over regular weekly hours.
      Returns:
      true if the current time falls within the restaurant's operating hours, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database error occurs during the check.

    • hasWaitingGuests

      public static boolean hasWaitingGuests() throws SQLException
      Checks if there are any guests currently with a 'WAITING' status. Used to maintain the order of the queue and prevent skipping.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one active waiting entry, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.
